definition: to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Mr. Prasart hasn’t neglected the more modern, Western-facing Thailand in his collections.
sentences.chinese: P先生沒有忽略更能代表現代西式泰國的藏品。

sentences.english: Collectibles have been a part of almost every culture since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 從古代開始，收藏品就是文化的一部分。

sentences.english: Provide dedicated glass art, collectibles and silverware tall.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠提供琉璃藝術品，收藏品及銀飾掛飾。

sentences.english: We want to create an online database of collectable items.
sentences.chinese: 我們要創建一個收藏品的網上數據庫。

sentences.english: The Australian collections in the exhibition room include Maori costume and ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 本陳列室澳洲收藏品包含毛利族服裝與飾品。

sentences.english: Indeed, it’s likely we will only see more of these kind of collectibles going forward.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們會看到更多這樣的收藏品。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the Illustrated Book of Pu Er Area collected at Yunnan Museum.
sentences.chinese: 介紹雲南博物館繪畫藏品《普洱府圖說》。

sentences.english: Fundació Joan Miró, Picasso Museum and Fundació Antoni Tàpies hold major collections of these world-renowned artists.
sentences.chinese: 比埃斯基金會擁有很多世界知名藝術家的珍藏品。

sentences.english: The second holding members are disposed on the opposite sides of the second blade, respectively.
sentences.chinese: 第二名藏品成員在第二把刀片的反面被配置，分別。

sentences.english: Lucy has a great stamp collection.
sentences.chinese: 露西有許多郵票收藏品。

sentences.english: Another collection is red pentagram for boys.
sentences.chinese: 還有男孩的收藏品就是紅五星。

sentences.english: The National Museum of American History has more than three million objects in its complete collection.
sentences.chinese: 國立美國曆史博物館擁有三百多萬件藏品。

sentences.english: Silk tapestry, top grade gift, rare collection.
sentences.chinese: 真絲掛毯，高檔禮品，稀世藏品。

sentences.english: One such collection was found in England in 1978.
sentences.chinese: 1978年在英格蘭就發現了一個這樣的珍藏品。

sentences.english: It is my hope that these dolls will be appreciated as collectables.
sentences.chinese: 這是我的希望，這些娃娃將作爲收藏品的讚賞。

definition: bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
